prompt:
Nurse: I'm glad to hear that, Mr. Valenzuela. Have you been feeling weak, lethargic, faint, or dizzy at all?

Patient: No.

Nurse: Just give me a second to work out the best way I can assist you. Just give me a second to work out the best way I can assist you.

Nurse: I'm sorry, Mr. Valenzuela, could you please confirm what you just said?

Patient: I didn't say anything.

Nurse: My apologies for the confusion, Mr. Valenzuela. I hope this procedure gives you and your doctor the answers you're looking for. Would it be okay if we go over a few topics on prep for your colonoscopy?

Patient: Yes, please.

Nurse: Hold on a second while I figure out how I can best support you.

responses.gpt4: Excellent, Mr. Valenzuela. I'm calling today to ensure you have everything you need. We'll start by first getting all the logistics out of the way. Your colonoscopy is scheduled for August 13th at 9:00 AM with Dr. Meredith Bailey. So, you'll need to arrive about 1 hour before at 8:00 AM. Does this sound okay with you?
responses.our_model: Okay, Mr. Valenzuela. I'm calling today to ensure you have everything you need for your colonoscopy. I will also call you again the day before your procedure. Let's first get all the logistics out of the way. Your colonoscopy procedure is scheduled for August 13th at 9:00 AM with Doctor Meredith Bailey. You'll need to arrive about 1 hour before at 8:00 AM. Is that okay with you?
